class.name: EditorSceneImporterFBX
class.description: This is an FBX 3D asset importer with full support for most FBX features. If exporting a FBX scene from Autodesk Maya, use these FBX export settings: [codeblock] - Leave settings at default in most exporters. (settings below in Maya are mostly irrelevant as they are the defaults.) - Triangluate (for meshes with blend shapes) - Deformed Models - Skins - Blend Shapes - Auto Tangents Only - *Do not check* Constraints (as it will break the file) - Units: ANY will work. - Binary format in FBX 2020 [/codeblock]
